[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@threebird/controls](./controls.md) &gt; [ScrollAction](./controls.scrollaction.md)

## ScrollAction interface

ScrollActions provide a way to add custom callback hooks for specific parts of the scroll area

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScrollAction 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [callback](./controls.scrollaction.callback.md) | (progress: number) =&gt; void | Callback with 0-1 progress when element is between start and end conditions. |
|  [end](./controls.scrollaction.end.md) | string | When to end the action, in %, px or vh. |
|  [start](./controls.scrollaction.start.md) | string | When to start the action, in %, px or vh. |
